high_descs: Turn right and walk to the dresser by the bed.
Pick up the CD near the window.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right and move to the nightstand to the right of the bed in front of the window.
Pick up the CD closest to the window and to the left of the alarm clock from the nightstand.
Turn right, move towards the basketball in the corner of the room, then turn left and face the front right corner of the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp to the right of the alarm clock on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD using the light from a lamp.

high_descs: Take a right and walk to the small wooden dresser next to the bed.
Pick up the silver disc near the window on the dresser.
Turn right and walk to the small lamp on the dresser to the left.
anns.task_desc: Examine a silver disc by the light of a small lamp.
